MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on the network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28pm on 29th December 2020
